about_the_game:
Enjoy 5 full levels of fast action shoot 'em up gameplay with the full version of Dead Christmas. Defeat alien robots, creatures, and swarms of zombie infected elves while restoring Santa's operation and healing his elves at the North Pole in order to save Christmas!
Easily switch between 1st and 3rd person gameplay in real-time along with fully customizable inputs for both keyboard or Xbox controller. Additional gamepad support provided via Steam Controller API which is fully customizable for all supported controllers.

In Dead Christmas, you step into the boots of Santa Claus himself, facing a nightmare like no other. A peaceful North Pole is thrown into disarray when an alien spacecraft crashes near Santa's village, unleashing a deadly virus that infects his loyal elves. The once-cheerful toy makers are now transformed into terrifying zombie-like creatures, and to make matters worse, the alien virus is mutating in the cold, giving rise to monstrous alien hybrids.

With his workshop overrun and Christmas Eve fast approaching, Santa must take matters into his own hands. Armed with an arsenal of magical holiday items and his centuries of wisdom, Santa must fight to save his elves, defeat the alien horde, and restore order to the North Pole. The fate of Christmas—and the entire world—depends on Santa stopping the alien plague before it spreads beyond the Arctic.
